entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
